DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether mindfulness meditation-based stress reduction program useful relieving symptom associate rheumatoid arthritis ( RA ) .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Confirmed diagnosis RA , doctor 's letter doctor ' bill ICD code 714 ; 18 year age old ; Able read write English ; Able attend 15 course session questionnaire session Kernan Hospital Baltimore ; Willing practice skill 45 minute 1 hour per day , 6 day week ; Stable rheumatoid medication least one month . Exclusion criterion : Major psychiatric illness ( bipolar disorder , multiple personality disorder , etc . ) ; Active alcoholism drug dependency ; Scheduled major surgery study period ; Enrolled randomize clinical trial rheumatoid arthritis study period ; Planning move area next 12 month ; Unwilling enrol control group ; Use assistive device cane ; Serious health condition ( ) investigator determines would make difficult complete 6 month study ; Diagnosis fibromyalgia .
